biotools.summary: Application that implements standard network analysis methods to compute the clustering, connectivity distribution, and detection of network motifs, as well as provides means to visualize networks and network motifs. It is capable of generating linked web pages from network datasets loaded in text format. It can also create networks from lists of gene or protein names.

bioschemas.name: SNAVI
